Package model.strategy

Class Strategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.strategy.Strategy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinimaxStrategy, RandomStrategy
    public abstract class Strategy
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents de logic behind de artificial intelligences' strategies.
    Author:
    PMC

    • Method Detail

      • calculateNextMove

        public abstract Pair<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> calculateNextMove​(Color currentColor,
                                                                                  GameState state)
        Method used to calculate the move that the owner player will play next
        Parameters:
        currentColor - Color of the players whose turn is going to be simulated
        state - Current state of the game
        Returns:
        coordinates where the next cube will be placed, null if the board is full

      • simulate

        public abstract int simulate​(Color currentColor,
                             int depth,
                             int alpha,
                             int beta)
        Auxiliary method used to make the needed calculations for caltulateNextMove
        Parameters:
        currentColor - Color of the current player whose turn is being simulated
        depth - Number of turns left to explore after any move is simulated
        alpha - Alpha value for the alpha-beta prune method
        beta - Beta value for the alpha-beta prune method
        Returns:
        The score that will be guaranteed to the player after playing the calculated move

      • availableStrategies

        public static java.lang.String availableStrategies()
        This method returns a String enumerating every Strategy and its difficulty
        Returns:
        String enumerating every Strategy and its difficulty

      • parse

        public static Strategy parse​(Color color,
                             java.lang.String type)
        Method that returns an instance of a Strategy subclass that matches the type
        Parameters:
        color - Color of the player that will own the Strategy instance
        type - Type of Strategy that wants to be instantiated
        Returns:
        Instance of a Strategy subclass that matches the type, null if there are no matches
